title: The Grappling Hook Brings You Back to Halo Infinite
description:
How much can a single device — one that's been present in video games as long as there's been video games — renovate the Halo formula? As it turns out: A whole bunch. Join us as we discuss Halo Infinite's campaign and multiplayer modes, and talk at length about where Chief's poop goes.

Games discussed: Halo Infinite, Loop Hero on Switch, Binding of Isaac (again), Final Fantasy 14: Endwalker (briefly)
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Griffin McElroy, Chris Plante)
